content:
AssetFormatOption AssetFormatOption Enum

In this Article

Edit

Specifies the the different format options that an IAsset can be created with.

Syntax

Declaration

public enum AssetFormatOptionPublic Enum AssetFormatOption

Fields

AdaptiveStreaming
AdaptiveStreaming

Specifies that an asset's format will be AdaptiveStreaming
None
None

Specifies no asset format option.

Details

Namespace

Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client

Assembly

Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll
